tooltip.bloodarsenalreawakened.totem_of_: Prevents death once and becomes 'Used Totem of Blood Shielding'. Works anywhere in the inventory.
tooltip.bloodarsenalreawakened.used_tote: It has expended its protective power.
tooltip.bloodarsenalreawakened.crimson_h: Consume up to 10 times. Each use grants +1 permanent heart.
tooltip.bloodarsenalreawakened.sanguine_: Consume up to 10 times. Each use grants +1 permanent heart.
tooltip.bloodarsenalreawakened.heart_of_: Consume up to 10 times. Each use grants +1 permanent heart.
tooltip.blood_arsenal_reawakened.reagent: An essence of sky and motion.
Condensed void energy, pulsing with teleportation magic.
Crackles faintly with bottled storm power.
A fragment of divine power, awakened and pure.
A dormant spark awaiting divine ignition.
Thirsts eternally for battle and blood.
The stench of death and rot clings to this essence.
tooltip.bloodarsenalreawakened.boots_of_: Applies Frost Walker effect on water while worn.
tooltip.bloodarsenalreawakened.blood_ars: Wear all 4 pieces for the set bonus.
tooltip.bloodarsenalreawakened.divinity_: Grants immortality and endless satiety when active.
tooltip.bloodarsenalreawakened.lightning: Right-click: strike lightning where you look. Shift-right-click: cycle power level (1–5).
tooltip.bloodarsenalreawakened.sigil_of_: Shift+Right-Click: save current position & dimension. Right-Click: teleport back (cross-dimension).
tooltip.bloodarsenalreawakened.ender_sig: Right-click: teleport to the block you look at (or 20 blocks forward). Shift+Right-click: open your Ender Chest.
tooltip.bloodarsenalreawakened.sigil_of_: When the blood of the earth touches the sky, the light gives way to eternal night.
tooltip.bloodarsenalreawakened.blood_bou: §oA blade forged in ritual. Executes the weak to feed your soul network. Shift-Right Click to hurl a spear of blood.
tooltip.blood_arsenal_reawakened.sanguin: Harvests the souls of the fallen. Shift + Right Click for Blood Vortex.
